subject: Hostages
Kidnapping
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cal Ripken Jr.’s 74-year-old mother was found with her hands bound in the back seat of her car Wednesday after being kidnapped at gunpoint a day earlier, the police and neighbors said.
snippet: Cal Ripken Jr.’s 74-year-old mother was found with her hands bound in the back seat of her car Wednesday after being kidnapped at gunpoint a day earlier, the police and neighbors said.
